Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: var _uslogs = [];_newline
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: (declarations)

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function CleanAttributes(sAttr) {_newline try{_newline var tl = 0;_newline var ta = sAttr.split("*");_newline var t = "";_newline var tt = [];_newline //everything before first * is the length of the next section_newline //8*Personal6*Person0*8*Owner Id0*0*_newline tl = parseInt(ta[0]);_newline for (var i = 1; i < ta.length; i++) {_newline if (tl == 0) {_newline t = "";_newline }_newline //kudos to Henkrik T._newline else if (ta[i].length < tl) {_newline ta[i+1] = ta[i] + "*" + ta[i+1];_newline continue;_newline }_newline //end_newline else {_newline t = ta[i].substring(0, tl);_newline }_newline tl = parseInt(ta[i].substring(tl, ta[i].length));_newline tt.push(t);_newline }_newline }_newline catch(e){_newline TheApplication().RaiseErrorText("Error in CleanAttributes: " + e.toString());_newline }_newline return tt;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: CleanAttributes

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function EvalExpr(Inputs, Outputs) {_newline var sExpr = Inputs.GetProperty("Expr");_newline var sBC = Inputs.GetProperty("BC");_newline var sBO = Inputs.GetProperty("BO");_newline var bc;_newline var bo;_newline try {_newlineif (sBO == ""){_newline bc = TheApplication().ActiveBusObject().GetBusComp(sBC);_newline}_newlineelse{_newline bo = TheApplication().GetBusObject(sBO);_newline bc = bo.GetBusComp(sBC);_newline}_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Result", bc.InvokeMethod("EvalExpr", sExpr));_newline } catch (e) {_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Result", e.toString());_newline } finally {_newline bc = null;_newline bo = null;_newline }_newline}_newline_newline
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: EvalExpr

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function EvalScript(Inputs, Outputs) {_newline var sExpr = Inputs.GetProperty("Expr");_newline try {_newline // reset logs_newline _uslogs = [];_newline _newline // evaluate_newline var v = eval(sExpr);_newline_newline // return an evaluation result if log function was not used_newline if (v && _uslogs.length === 0) {_newline log(v);_newline }_newline } catch (e) {_newline log(e.toString(), "\nSource code:\n" + sExpr);_newline } finally {_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Result", _uslog_usprint());_newlineOutputs.SetProperty("v",v);_newline }_newline}_newline
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: EvalScript

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function FastInspect(Inputs, Outputs) {_newline var wsname = Inputs.GetProperty("WorkspaceName");_newline var wsver = Inputs.GetProperty("WorkspaceVersion");_newline_newline var bo = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Workspace");_newline var wsbc = bo.GetBusComp("Repository Workspace");_newline var verbc = bo.GetBusComp("WSUI Workspace Versions");_newline_newline try {_newline wsbc.SetSearchSpec("Name",wsname);_newline wsbc.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline wsbc.ExecuteQuery(ForwardBackward);_newline if (wsbc.FirstRecord()) {_newline //verbc.SetSearchSpec("Ver Num",parseInt(wsver));_newline verbc.SetSearchSpec("Ver Num",wsver);_newline verbc.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline verbc.ActivateField("Ver Num");_newline verbc.ExecuteQuery(ForwardBackward);_newline if(verbc.FirstRecord()){_newline verbc.InvokeMethod("OpenWS");_newline wsbc.InvokeMethod("PreviewWS");_newline }_newline else{_newline //version not found, open/inspect latest version_newline wsbc.InvokeMethod("OpenWS");_newline wsbc.InvokeMethod("PreviewWS");_newline }_newline } _newline else {_newline throw("Workspace name not found: " + wsname);_newline }_newline } _newline catch (e) {_newline TheApplication().RaiseErrorText(e.toString());_newline } _newline finally {_newline wsbc = null;_newline verbc = null;_newline bo = null;_newline }_newline}_newline
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: FastInspect

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function GetBusinessServiceList (Inputs, Outputs)_newline{_newlinevar bo = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Business Service");_newlinevar bc = bo.GetBusComp("Business Service Test");_newlinebc.NewRecord();_newlinevar bcp = bc.GetPicklistBusComp("Service Name");_newlinevar ops = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newlinebcp.ClearToQuery();_newlinebcp.ActivateField("Name");_newlinebcp.ActivateField("Display Name");_newlinebcp.SetSortSpec("Name(ASCENDING)");_newlinebcp.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline_newlineif (bcp.FirstRecord()){_newline do{_newline Outputs.SetProperty(bcp.GetFieldValue("Name"),bcp.GetFieldValue("Display Name"));_newline }while (bcp.NextRecord())_newline}_newlinebc.UndoRecord();_newline// = ops.Copy();_newlinebcp = null;_newlinebc = null;_newlinebo = null;_newlineops = null;_newline}_newline
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: GetBusinessServiceList

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function GetIOList (Inputs, Outputs)_newline{_newlinevar bo = TheApplication().GetBusObject("SRF Interface");_newlinevar bc = bo.GetBusComp("SRF Integration Object");_newlinebc.ClearToQuery();_newlinebc.ActivateField("Name");_newlinebc.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newlineif (bc.FirstRecord()){_newline do{_newline Outputs.SetProperty(bc.GetFieldValue("Name"),bc.GetFieldValue("Name"));_newline } while (bc.NextRecord())_newline}_newlinebc = null;_newlinebo = null;_newline}_newline
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: GetIOList

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function GetRRBC (Inputs,Outputs)_newline{_newlinevar bcname = Inputs.GetProperty("Business Component");_newlinevar fieldname = Inputs.GetProperty("Field");_newlinevar sv = TheApplication().GetService("EAI Siebel Adapter");_newlinevar ips = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline//var ops = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newlinevar ssp = "";_newlineips.SetProperty("OutputIntObjectName","Base BCRM RR");_newlinessp = "[BCRM RR BusComp.Name]=\"" + bcname + "\"";_newlineif (fieldname != ""){_newline ssp += " AND [BCRM RR Field.Name]=\"" + fieldname + "\"";_newline}_newlineips.SetProperty("SearchSpec",ssp);_newlinesv.InvokeMethod("Query",ips,Outputs);_newline_newline}_newline
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: GetRRBC

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function GetRRData(Inputs, Outputs) {_newline try{_newline var psCache = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline var psIn = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline var psOut = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline var psDef, cpsDef;_newline var psAttr = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline var cpsAttr = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline var cc, i;_newline var ccc = 0;_newline //var raw = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline psIn.SetProperty("Object Type", Inputs.GetProperty("Object Type"));_newline psIn.SetProperty("Object Name", Inputs.GetProperty("Object Name"));_newline psOut = GetRawRRData(psIn);_newline cc = psOut.GetChildCount();_newline_newline //root_newline psAttr = TranslateAttr(psOut, psCache);_newline psOut.AddChild(psAttr);_newline //end root_newline_newline //level 1 children_newline if (cc > 0) {_newline for (i = 0; i < cc; i++) {_newline psAttr = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline psDef = psOut.GetChild(i);_newline //let's ignore scripts, they cause trouble_newline if (psDef.GetType().indexOf("Script") == -1){_newline ccc = psDef.GetChildCount();_newline psAttr = TranslateAttr(psDef, psCache);_newline psOut.GetChild(i).AddChild(psAttr);_newline //level 2 children_newline if (ccc > 0) {_newline for (var k = 0; k < ccc; k++) {_newline cpsAttr = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline cpsDef = psDef.GetChild(k);_newline cpsAttr = TranslateAttr(cpsDef, psCache);_newline psOut.GetChild(i).GetChild(k).AddChild(cpsAttr);_newline }_newline }//end level 2 children_newline }_newline }_newline }//end level 1 children_newline_newline Outputs.AddChild(psOut);_newline }_newline catch(e){_newline TheApplication().RaiseErrorText("Error in GetRRData: " + e.toString());_newline }_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: GetRRData

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function GetRawRRData(Inputs) {_newline try{_newline var boTypeRR = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Runtime Repository Details");_newline var bsWFUtils = TheApplication().GetService("Workflow Utilities");_newline var psIn = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline var psOut = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline //use "Type" to get metameta_newline var bcTypeRR = boTypeRR.GetBusComp("Runtime Repository " + Inputs.GetProperty("Object Type"));_newline //eg. "Field" or "Join"..._newline var sTypeRR = Inputs.GetProperty("Object Name");_newline var sDef;_newline bcTypeRR.ClearToQuery();_newline bcTypeRR.ActivateField("Complied Obj Def");_newline bcTypeRR.SetSearchExpr("[Name] LIKE \"" + sTypeRR + "\"");_newline bcTypeRR.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newline if (bcTypeRR.FirstRecord()) {_newline sDef = bcTypeRR.GetFieldValue("Complied Obj Def");_newline psIn.SetValue(sDef);_newline bsWFUtils.InvokeMethod("TextToPropSet", psIn, psOut);_newline }_newline }_newline catch(e){_newline TheApplication().RaiseErrorText("Error in GetRawRRData: " + e.toString());_newline }_newline return psOut;_newline}_newline
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: GetRawRRData

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function GetTypeRRFieldMap(Inputs, Outputs) {_newline try{_newline var psIn = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline var psOut = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline psIn.SetProperty("Object Type", "Type");_newline psIn.SetProperty("Object Name", Inputs.GetProperty("Object Type"));_newline psOut = GetRawRRData(psIn);_newline var psDef, sAttr, arrAttr, ts;_newline var arTypeRR = [];_newline var arTypeNoCompRR = [];_newline var arTypeFilteredRR = [];_newline //kudos to Henrik T._newline var arTypeNoExtRR = [];_newline_newline var cc = psOut.GetChildCount();_newline if (cc > 0) {_newline for (var i = 0; i < cc; i++) {_newline psDef = psOut.GetChild(i);_newline sAttr = psDef.GetProperty("ATTRS");_newline arrAttr = CleanAttributes(sAttr);_newline for (var j = 0; j < arrAttr.length; j++) {_newline ts = arrAttr[j];_newline_newline //Field name array_newline if (j == 3) {_newline arTypeRR.push(ts);_newline }_newline //array of "No Compile" flags_newline if (j == 4) {_newline arTypeNoCompRR.push(ts);_newline }_newline//array of "Extension" flags_newline//kudos to Henrik T._newlineif (j == 7) {_newline_newlinearTypeNoExtRR.push(ts);_newline_newline}_newline }_newline }_newline }_newline/*_newline //apply filter to get only compiled fields_newline for (var k = 0; k < arTypeNoCompRR.length; k++) {_newline if (arTypeNoCompRR[k] == "N") {_newline arTypeFilteredRR.push(arTypeRR[k]);_newline }_newline }_newline*/_newline//kudos to Henrik T._newline//apply filter to get only compiled fields and no extension fields_newline_newlinefor (var k = 0; k < arTypeNoCompRR.length; k++) {_newline_newline // if (arTypeNoCompRR[k] == "N") {_newline_newline if (arTypeNoCompRR[k] == "N" && arTypeNoExtRR[k] == "N") {_newline_newline arTypeFilteredRR.push(arTypeRR[k]);_newline_newline }_newline_newline}_newline Outputs.SetProperty("RRFieldMap", arTypeFilteredRR.join(","));_newline }_newline catch(e){_newline TheApplication().RaiseErrorText("Error in GetTypeRRFieldMap: " + e.toString());_newline }_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: GetTypeRRFieldMap

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function InspectWS (Inputs, Outputs)_newline{_newline var name = Inputs.GetProperty("Name");_newline var bInspect = (Inputs.GetProperty("Inspect") == "Y");_newline var iLimit = ToNumber(Inputs.GetProperty("Limit"));_newline var res = "", sWS = "";_newline _newline var bo = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Workspace");_newline var bc = bo.GetBusComp("Repository Workspace");_newline var ss = "";_newline if (name == "") {_newline ss = '[Created By] = LoginId () AND [Status] <> "Delivered" AND [Repository Id] = RepositoryId()';_newline } else if (name.match(/\[.*\]/g)) {_newline ss = name;_newline } else {_newline ss = '[Name] like "' + name + '" AND [Repository Id] = RepositoryId()';_newline }_newline _newline try {_newline bc.SetSearchExpr(ss);_newline bc.SetViewMode(AllView);_newline bc.SetSortSpec("Updated(DESC)");_newline bc.ExecuteQuery(ForwardBackward);_newline var h = bc.FirstRecord();_newline if (h) {_newline if (bInspect) {_newline bc.InvokeMethod("OpenWS");_newline bc.InvokeMethod("PreviewWS");_newline sWS = bc.GetFieldValue("Name");_newline } else {_newline var aWS = [];_newline var i = 1;_newline while(h && i <= iLimit) {_newline aWS.push(bc.GetFieldValue("Name"));_newline h = bc.NextRecord();_newline i++;_newline }_newline sWS = aWS.join(",");_newline }_newline } else {_newline res = "No workspace found with SearchSpec: " + ss;_newline }_newline } catch(e) {_newline res = "Error happened inspecting a workspace with SearchSpec: " + ss + "\n" + e.toString();_newline } finally {_newline bc = null;_newline bo = null;_newline }_newline _newline Outputs.SetProperty("Result", res);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Workspaces", sWS);_newline}_newline
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: InspectWS

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function InvokeServiceMethod(Inputs, Outputs)_newline{_newline // Extract service/method name params_newline var sBS = Inputs.GetProperty("Service");_newline Inputs.RemoveProperty("Service");_newline var sMethod = Inputs.GetProperty("Method");_newline Inputs.RemoveProperty("Method");_newline _newline var bs;_newline _newline try {_newline // invoke BS_newline bs = TheApplication().GetService(sBS);_newline bs.InvokeMethod(sMethod, Inputs, Outputs);_newline }catch(e){_newline throw e;_newline }finally{_newline bs = null;_newline }_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: InvokeServiceMethod

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script:
function ProcessLogRequest(Inputs, Outputs)_newline{_newline /*_newline Created 21-Jan-2021 by Jason MacZura to allow Siebel developers to turn SQL tracing on and off, and to display_newline the SQL trace files in the browser. _newline */_newline var sFilePath = Inputs.GetProperty("FilePath");_newline if (sFilePath == "") sFilePath = "/siebelfs/developer/"; // Log the files to a subdirectory on the Siebel File System for global access_newline_newline var bsSvc:Service = TheApplication().GetService("EAI File Transport");_newline var psIn:PropertySet = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline var psOut:PropertySet = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline var oTransService:Service = TheApplication().GetService("Transcode Service");_newline var oTransOutputs:PropertySet = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline_newline try_newline {_newline var sOperation = Inputs.GetProperty("Operation");_newline var strLogin = TheApplication().LoginName();_newline var sTraceMsg = Inputs.GetProperty("TraceMsg");_newline var sTraceType = Inputs.GetProperty("TraceType");_newline if (sOperation == "ViewLog"){_newline var strKeepFile = Inputs.GetProperty("RetainFile");_newline_newline psIn.SetProperty("FileName", sFilePath + strLogin + ".log");_newline psIn.SetProperty("FileSleepTime", "1"); // No need to wait around for the file (default is 20000 ms)_newline_newline if (strKeepFile == "false") psIn.SetProperty("DeleteFile", "True"); // Delete the file to keep the size down_newline_newline bsSvc.InvokeMethod("Receive", psIn, psOut); // If the file doesn't exist, Siebel throws an error._newline_newline // The output from EAI File Transport is in binary format. Use Transcode to convert it to text._newline psOut.SetProperty("ConversionMode", "EncodingToString");_newline psOut.SetProperty("SourceEncoding", "UTF-8");_newline oTransService.InvokeMethod("Convert", psOut, oTransOutputs);_newline var strContent = oTransOutputs.GetValue();_newline_newline var myOutput = strContent;//.split('\n').join('
'); // replace the newline characters with HTML
tags for display in the dialog box_newline_newline Outputs.SetProperty("myOutput", myOutput);_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Status", "File retrieved");_newline_newline }_newline else if (sOperation == "StartLogging")_newline {_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Status", "Logging Started");_newline if (sTraceType == "SQL" || sTraceType == ""){_newline TheApplication().TraceOn(sFilePath + strLogin + ".log", "SQL", "");_newline }_newline if (sTraceType == "Allocation"){_newline TheApplication().TraceOn(sFilePath + strLogin + ".log", "Allocation", "All");_newline }_newline }_newline else if (sOperation == "StopLogging")_newline {_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Status", "Logging Stopped");_newline TheApplication().TraceOff();_newline }_newline else if (sOperation == "Trace"){_newline TheApplication().Trace(sTraceMsg);_newline }_newline else_newline {_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Status", "Unknown Operation argument " + sOperation);_newline }_newline }_newline catch (e)_newline {_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Error",e.toString());_newline Outputs.SetProperty("Status","Error");_newline Outputs.SetProperty("myOutput", "");_newline }_newline finally_newline {_newline oTransOutputs = null;_newline oTransService = null;_newline psOut = null;_newline psIn = null;_newline bsSvc = null;_newline }_newline_newline}_newline
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: ProcessLogRequest

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function Service_usPreInvokeMethod (MethodName, Inputs, Outputs)_newline{_newline if (MethodName == "EvalExpr"){_newline EvalExpr(Inputs, Outputs);_newline }_newline if (MethodName == "EvalScript"){_newline EvalScript(Inputs, Outputs);_newline }_newline if (MethodName == "InvokeServiceMethod"){_newline InvokeServiceMethod(Inputs, Outputs);_newline }_newline if (MethodName == "Log"){_newline AppLog(Inputs, Outputs);_newline }_newline if (MethodName == "InspectWS"){_newline InspectWS (Inputs, Outputs);_newline }_newline if (MethodName == "InspectWSVersion"){_newline InspectWSVersion(Inputs, Outputs);_newline }_newlineif (MethodName == "FastInspect"){_newline FastInspect(Inputs, Outputs);_newline }_newlineif (MethodName == "ProcessLogRequest"){_newline ProcessLogRequest(Inputs, Outputs);_newline }_newlineif (MethodName == "GetRRData"){_newline GetRRData(Inputs, Outputs);_newline }_newlineif (MethodName == "srvrmgr"){_newline srvrmgr(Inputs, Outputs);_newline }_newlineif (MethodName == "runcmd"){_newline runcmd(Inputs, Outputs);_newline }_newlineif (MethodName == "readFile"){_newline readFile(Inputs, Outputs);_newline }_newlineif (MethodName == "GetRRBC"){_newline GetRRBC(Inputs,Outputs);_newline}_newlineif (MethodName == "GetBusinessServiceList"){_newline GetBusinessServiceList(Inputs,Outputs);_newline}_newlineif (MethodName == "GetIOList"){_newline GetIOList(Inputs,Outputs);_newline}_newlineif (MethodName == "getWFList"){_newline getWFList(Inputs,Outputs);_newline}_newlineif (MethodName == "getDRWFProps"){_newline getDRWFProps(Inputs,Outputs);_newline}_newlineif (MethodName == "openPopup"){_newline openPopup(Inputs,Outputs);_newline}_newlineif (MethodName == "getFWKVersion"){_newline getFWKVersion(Inputs,Outputs);_newline}_newline return (CancelOperation);_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: Service_usPreInvokeMethod

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function TranslateAttr(Inputs, psCache) {_newline try{_newline var psFilter = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline var psIn = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline var psAttr = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline var psDef = Inputs;_newline var otype = "";_newline var sAttr = psDef.GetProperty("ATTRS");_newline var arrAttr = CleanAttributes(sAttr);_newline var rrfmap = "";_newline var arTypeFilteredRR;_newline var ts;_newline var fv = "";_newline_newline otype = psDef.GetType();_newline if (psCache.GetProperty(otype) == "") {_newline psIn.SetProperty("Object Type", otype);_newline GetTypeRRFieldMap(psIn, psFilter);_newline rrfmap = psFilter.GetProperty("RRFieldMap");_newline psCache.SetProperty(otype, rrfmap);_newline }_newline else {_newline rrfmap = psCache.GetProperty(otype);_newline }_newline_newline arTypeFilteredRR = rrfmap.split(",");_newline_newline for (var h = 0; h < arrAttr.length; h++) {_newline ts = arrAttr[h];_newline fv = arTypeFilteredRR[h];_newline psAttr.SetProperty(fv, ts);_newline }_newline psAttr.SetType("Properties");_newline }_newline catch(e){_newline TheApplication().RaiseErrorText("Error in TranslateAttr: " + e.toString() + "otype: " + otype + "***rrfmap: " + rrfmap + "***fv: " + fv);_newline }_newline return psAttr;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: TranslateAttr

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function _uslog_usobj(o, s) {_newline var res = '';_newline s = ('undefined' === typeof s? '' : s);_newline /* traditional representation */_newline res += s + o;_newline s += '\t';_newline /* and also all available keys */_newline for (var k in o) {_newline try{_newline var v = o[k];_newline if (typeof v === "object"){_newline res += String.fromCharCode(10) + _uslog_usobj(v, s);_newline } else {_newline res += String.fromCharCode(10) + s + k + ' = ' + v;_newline }_newline }catch(e){_newline res += String.fromCharCode(10) + s + k + ' = ' + e.toString();_newline }_newline }_newline return res;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: _uslog_usobj

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function _uslog_usone(o){_newline var val = '';_newline if ('object' === typeof o){ _newline if('function' == typeof o.toString && o.toString() === '[object PropertySet]') {_newline val = String.fromCharCode(10) + _uslog_usps(o, '\t');_newline }else{_newline val = String.fromCharCode(10) + _uslog_usobj(o, '\t');_newline }_newline } else {_newline val = o;_newline }_newline return val;_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: _uslog_usone

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function _uslog_usprint() {_newline return _uslogs.join(String.fromCharCode(13));_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: _uslog_usprint

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function _uslog_usps(o, s) {_newline var res = '';_newline s = ('undefined' === typeof s ? '' : s);_newline /* type */_newline res += s + (o.GetType() ? o.GetType() : 'PropertySet');_newline /* value */_newline res += o.GetValue() ? ' = ' + o.GetValue() : '';_newline s += '\t';_newline /* properties */_newline var p = o.GetFirstProperty();_newline while (p) {_newline res += String.fromCharCode(10) + s + p + ' = ' + o.GetProperty(p);_newline p = o.GetNextProperty();_newline }_newline /* children */_newline for (var i = 0; i < o.GetChildCount(); i++) {_newline res += String.fromCharCode(10) + _uslog_usps(o.GetChild(i), s);_newline }_newline return res;_newline}_newline_newline
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: _uslog_usps

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function getDRWFProps (Inputs, Outputs)_newline{_newlinevar wn = Inputs.GetProperty("Process Name");_newlinevar bo = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Repository Details");_newlinevar bc = bo.GetBusComp("Repository WF Process Prop");_newlinevar prop;_newlinebc.ClearToQuery();_newlinebc.ActivateField("Name");_newlinebc.ActivateField("Parent Name");_newlinebc.ActivateField("Inactive");_newlinebc.ActivateField("InOut");_newlinebc.ActivateField("Data Type");_newlinebc.ActivateField("Default String");_newlinebc.ActivateField("Comments");_newlinebc.SetSearchExpr("[Parent Name]='" + wn + "'");_newlinebc.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newlineif (bc.FirstRecord()){_newline do{_newline prop = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline prop.SetProperty("Name",bc.GetFieldValue("Name"));_newline prop.SetProperty("Inactive",bc.GetFieldValue("Inactive"));_newline prop.SetProperty("InOut",bc.GetFieldValue("InOut"));_newline prop.SetProperty("Data Type",bc.GetFieldValue("Data Type"));_newline prop.SetProperty("Default String",bc.GetFieldValue("Default String"));_newline prop.SetProperty("Comments",bc.GetFieldValue("Comments"));_newline Outputs.AddChild(prop);_newline }while (bc.NextRecord())_newline}_newlinebc = null;_newlinebo = null;_newline}_newline
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: getDRWFProps

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function getFWKVersion (Inputs, Outputs)_newline{_newline var v = "50";_newline Outputs.SetProperty("FWK Version",v);_newline}_newline
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: getFWKVersion

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function getWFList (Inputs, Outputs)_newline{_newlinevar bo = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Runtime Repository Details");_newlinevar bc = bo.GetBusComp("Runtime Repository Workflow");_newlinebc.ClearToQuery();_newlinebc.ActivateField("Name");_newlinebc.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newlineif (bc.FirstRecord()){_newline do{_newline Outputs.SetProperty(bc.GetFieldValue("Name"),"");_newline }while (bc.NextRecord())_newline}_newlinevar bod = TheApplication().GetBusObject("Repository Details");_newlinevar bcd = bod.GetBusComp("Repository Workflow Process");_newlinevar wn = "";_newlinebcd.ClearToQuery();_newlinebcd.ActivateField("Name");_newlinebcd.SetSearchSpec("Inactive","N");_newlinebcd.ExecuteQuery(ForwardOnly);_newlineif (bcd.FirstRecord()){_newline do{_newline wn = bcd.GetFieldValue("Name");_newline if (wn.indexOf(":") > -1){_newline wn = wn.split(":")[0];_newline }_newline Outputs.SetProperty(wn,"");_newline }while (bcd.NextRecord())_newline}_newline}_newline
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: getWFList

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function log() {_newline var res = [];_newline var d = new Date();_newline var sd = d.toString();_newline res.push(sd.substr(sd.length-9, 8) + ':' + d.getMilliseconds());_newline for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {_newline res.push(_uslog_usone(arguments[i]));_newline }_newline _uslogs.push(res.join('\t|\t'));_newlinereturn arguments[i];_newline}
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: log

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function openPopup (Inputs, Outputs)_newline{_newline//kudos: http://siebelmantra.blogspot.com/2013/08/how-to-display-popup-applet-in-siebel.html_newlinevar an = Inputs.GetProperty("Applet Name");_newlinevar mode = Inputs.GetProperty("Applet Mode");_newlinevar oBSSLM = TheApplication().GetService("SLM Save List Service");_newlinevar psInp = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline//var psOut = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newlinepsInp.SetProperty("Applet Height", "620");_newlinepsInp.SetProperty("Applet Mode", mode); // 1 - List Applet, 2 - Form Applet_newlinepsInp.SetProperty("Applet Name", an);_newlinepsInp.SetProperty("Applet Width", "210");_newlineoBSSLM.InvokeMethod("LoadPopupApplet", psInp , Outputs);_newlineoBSSLM = null;_newline}_newline
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: openPopup

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function readFile (Inputs,Outputs)_newline{_newlinevar fn = Inputs.GetProperty("FileName");_newlinevar st = Inputs.GetProperty("FileSleepTime");_newlineif (st == ""){ st = "5000"; }_newlinevar fs = TheApplication().GetService("EAI File Transport");_newlinevar fi = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newlinevar fo = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newlinefi.SetProperty("FileName",fn);_newlinefi.SetProperty("FileSleepTime",st);_newlinefs.InvokeMethod("Receive",fi,fo);_newline//convert output_newlinevar ts = TheApplication().GetService("Transcode Service");_newlinevar tso = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newlinefo.SetProperty("ConversionMode", "EncodingToString");_newlinefo.SetProperty("SourceEncoding", "UTF-8");_newlinets.InvokeMethod("Convert", fo, tso);_newlineOutputs.SetValue(tso.GetValue());_newline}_newline
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: readFile

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script: function runcmd (Inputs, Outputs)_newline{_newline var cmd = Inputs.GetProperty("cmd");_newline Clib.system(cmd);_newline}_newline
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: runcmd

Business_spcService_spcScript.Script:
function srvrmgr (Inputs,Outputs)_newline{_newlinevar ts = new Date;_newlinevar tsm = ts.toSystem().toString();_newlinevar ln = TheApplication().LoginName();_newlinevar pa = Inputs.GetProperty("FilePath");_newlineif (pa == ""){_newline pa = "C:\Siebel\ses\siebsrvr\TEMP\";_newline}_newlinevar st = Inputs.GetProperty("FileSleepTime");_newlineif (st == ""){_newline st = "5000";_newline}_newlinevar fn = pa + "srvrmgr_usinput.txt";_newlinevar sf = pa + ln + "_us" + tsm + "_ussrvrmgr_usspool.txt";_newlinevar cmd = Inputs.GetProperty("cmd");_newline_newlinevar fs = TheApplication().GetService("EAI File Transport");_newlinevar svc = TheApplication().GetService("BCRM Server Manager Service");_newlinevar ts = TheApplication().GetService("Transcode Service");_newline_newline//write input file_newlinevar fi = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newlinevar fo = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newlinefi.SetProperty("FileName",fn);_newlinecmd = "spool " + sf + "
" + cmd + "
" + "spool off" + "
" + "exit";_newlinefi.SetValue(cmd);_newlinefs.InvokeMethod("Send",fi,fo);_newline_newline//run srvrmgr command_newlinevar ips = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newline//ips.SetProperty("migrationid","TEST1");_newlinevar ops = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newlinesvc.InvokeMethod("Export", ips, ops);_newline_newline//retrieve spool file_newlinefi.Reset();_newlinefi.SetProperty("FileSleepTime", st);_newlinefi.SetProperty("FileName",sf);_newlinefi.SetProperty("DeleteFile","true");_newlinefs.InvokeMethod("Receive",fi,fo);_newline_newline//convert output_newlinevar tso = TheApplication().NewPropertySet();_newlinefo.SetProperty("ConversionMode", "EncodingToString");_newlinefo.SetProperty("SourceEncoding", "UTF-8");_newlinets.InvokeMethod("Convert", fo, tso);_newlineOutputs.SetValue(tso.GetValue());_newline}_newline
Business_spcService_spcScript.Name: srvrmgr
